reviewHighlights.text: It was a short and raw game with broken mechanics, and there were often bugs that could have been ignored, but the game was already a bit boring, but...
An interesting simulator, a walker with good graphics and a bright picture, a top-notch plot and awesome art, I liked everything about it.
